channel.title: Tor Browser Security Advisory - NoScript is temporarily disabled
channel.description:
**Warning:** 4 May, 2019: [NoScript is temporarily disabled](https://blog.torproject.org/noscript-temporarily-disabled-tor-browser) in Tor Browser (Firefox-ESR), due to the [expiration of an intermediate signing certificate](https://blog.torproject.org/noscript-temporarily-disabled-tor-browser). [[1]](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1548973)
Meanwhile, anyone who is dependent on the security provided by the higher security levels can apply the following workaround, see:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Notice

item.title: Tor Browser Security Advisory - NoScript is temporarily disabled
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
This is fixed now for the latest version of TBB. So user should upgrade his browser to solve this issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Tor Browser Security Advisory - NoScript is temporarily disabled
